sentence.Network_en: Their avarice knows no bounds; you can never satisfy them.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们贪得无厌, 你永远无法满足他们.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... autonomy n. 自治 avarice ? n. 贪财, 贪婪 aver v. 断言证明.
贪字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 贪心不足〖 beinsatiablygreedy〗 贪欲〖 greed;avarice;rapacity〗 贪赃〖 takebribes;practisegraft〗.
新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... autonomy n. 自治 avarice ? n. 贪财, 贪婪 aver v. 断言证明.
说文解字：贪_百度知道 ... 贪污[ corruption;graft] 贪心[ greed;avarice;rapacity] 贪心不足[ be insatiably greedy].

list.abs: Daily... ... Of Avarice 论贪婪 boundless avarice 欲壑难填 Yet I have a last reservation. 不过，我还有最后一点保留意见。.
sordid avarice ; sordid material interests ., 卑鄙的贪心 ; 肮脏的物质利益.
be reckless of the life . don't do a credulity , avarice person .生活中别大意。不要做一个轻信和贪婪的人。
Excessive desire , especially for wealth ; covetousness or avarice ., 贪欲过度的渴望 , 尤指对财富的贪求 ; 贪婪或贪欲.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French, from Latin avaritia, from avarus 'greedy'

entry.def: Avarice is extremely strong desire for money and possessions.

example.ex: He paid a month's rent in advance, just enough to satisfy the landlord's avarice.
example.tran: 他预交了一个月的房租，正好满足房东的贪心。

means.word_mean: 1. reprehensible acquisitiveness; insatiable desire for wealth (personified as one of the deadly sins)

auth_sentence.content: This avarice...hath been the sword of our slain kings.
auth_sentence.res_content: This avarice...hath been the sword of our slain kings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This avarice...hath been the sword of our slain kings.

auth_sentence.content: Perhaps it was avarice, perhaps it was terror.
auth_sentence.res_content: Perhaps it was avarice, perhaps it was terror.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Perhaps it was avarice, perhaps it was terror.

auth_sentence.content: In fact sloth might be better grounds for dismissal than avarice.
auth_sentence.res_content: In fact sloth might be better grounds for dismissal than avarice.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In fact sloth might be better grounds for dismissal than avarice.

stems_affixes.word_buile: avar渴望+ice行为,状态→渴望状态→贪心
capr山羊+ice行为,状态→像山羊一样乱蹦→任性
coward懦弱的人,胆小的人+ice行为,状态→n.胆小,懦弱
crev裂开+ice行为,状态→n.缺口,裂缝
mal坏+ice行为,状态→n.恶意;蓄意犯罪
spli=split分裂+ice行为,状态→由分裂反推成衔接
avarice[n.贪财,贪婪]+ous……的→adj.贪财的, 贪婪的
avar渴望,鸟+ice状态→渴望状态→贪心
